text: Dangshi, yi bu la xin shuo:“Wo de zhu a! Qiu ni shi zheli [mai jia] chengwei yige ping'an di chengshi, qiu ni ci shuiguo gei zheli de renmin, ji ci gei tamen zhong xinyang an la he mori zhe.” Ta [an la] shuo:“Bu xinyang zhe, wo jiang rang ta zhanshi xiangshou, ranhou, wo jiang poshi ta qu shou huo yu de xingfa. Guisu zhen elie!”
